meanings.definition: A wide, open area or surface.
meanings.sent1: The vast expanse of the desert stretched out before us.
meanings.sent2: The ocean expanse seemed endless as we sailed across it.
meanings.sent3: The expanse of the picnic blanket was so huge, we could barely find our sandwiches.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an expanse of creativity, flowing endlessly with new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The expanse of stars in the night sky took my breath away.

meanings.sent1: The snowy expanse of the field sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The vast expanse of the forest was home to many different animals.
meanings.sent3: The expanse of the parking lot was so big, we had to walk a long way to reach the store.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was an expanse that knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The expanse of knowledge in the library was overwhelming.
